item.title: A Reminder That Fallout’s Episode Release Times Have Changed
item.description: The last two episodes of Fallout season 2 are upon us, but now Amazon has changed when they release for some reason.

item.title: ARC Raiders’ New 3-Strike Cheater Permaban Is Annoying Players
item.description: ARC Raiders has a cheating problem and a new policy of progressive timeouts is not going far enough, players say.

item.title: Viral AI Sidekick ‘Clawdbot’ Changes Name To ‘Moltbot’ And Sheds Its Old Skin
item.description: Nnew AI viral sensation changes its name to Moltbot after Anthropic flagged potential trademark confusion
